verses.verse: <S%H935>Behold,<s%> there came a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> out of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to Beth <S%H1008>El:<s%> and <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> was <S%H5975>standing<s%> by the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to burn <S%H6999>incense.<s%>

He <S%H7121>cried<s%> against the <S%H4196>altar<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4196>"Altar,<s%> <S%H4196>altar,<s%> thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H1121><s%> 'Behold, a son shall be <S%H3205>born<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> by <S%H8034>name.<s%> On you he shall <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places<s%> who burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> on <S%H8313>you,<s%> and they will burn <S%H120>men<s%>'s bones on <S%H6106>you.<s%>'"

He <S%H5414>gave<s%> a <S%H4159>sign<s%> the same <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "This is the <S%H4159>sign<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken:<s%> <S%H4196>Behold,<s%> the altar will be <S%H7167>split<s%> <S%H1880>apart,<s%> and the ashes that are on it will be poured <S%H8210>out.<s%>"

It <S%H4428>happened,<s%> when the king <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>saying<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> which he <S%H7121>cried<s%> against the <S%H4196>altar<s%> in <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> that <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> put <S%H7971>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8610>"Seize<s%> <S%H3027>him!<s%>" His hand, which he put <S%H7971>out<s%> against <S%H3001>him,<s%> dried up, so that he <S%H3201>could<s%> not draw it back again to <S%H7725>himself.<s%>

The <S%H4196>altar<s%> also was <S%H7167>split<s%> <S%H1880>apart,<s%> and the ashes poured <S%H8210>out<s%> from the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> according to the <S%H4159>sign<s%> which the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H559>the<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> "Now <S%H2470>entreat<s%> the <S%H6440>favor<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H2470>pray<s%> for <S%H3027>me,<s%> that my hand may be restored me <S%H7725>again.<s%>" The <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2470>entreated<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%> was restored him <S%H7725>again,<s%> and became as it was <S%H7223>before.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H935>"Come<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%> with <S%H5582>me,<s%> and refresh <S%H5414>yourself,<s%> and I will give you a <S%H4991>reward.<s%>"

The <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> "Even if you <S%H5414>gave<s%> me <S%H2677>half<s%> of your <S%H1004>house,<s%> I would not go <S%H935>in<s%> with <S%H398>you,<s%> neither would I eat <S%H3899>bread<s%> nor <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in this <S%H4725>place;<s%>

for so was it <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H398><s%> 'You shall eat no <S%H3899>bread,<s%> nor <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> neither <S%H7725>return<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> that you <S%H1980>came.<s%>'"
So he <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H7725>didn't<s%> return by the <S%H1870>way<s%> that he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%>

Now there <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H259>an<s%> <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H5030>prophet<s%> in <S%H1008>Bethel;<s%> and one of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5608>told<s%> him all the <S%H4639>works<s%> that the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> in <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%> They also <S%H1696>told<s%> their <S%H4428>father<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> which he had <S%H5608>spoken<s%> to the <S%H1>king.<s%>

Their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H1870>them,<s%> "Which way did he <S%H1980>go?<s%>" Now his <S%H1121>sons<s%> had <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H335>which<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>went,<s%> who <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
He <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H2280>"Saddle<s%> the <S%H2543>donkey<s%> for <S%H2280>me.<s%>" So they saddled the <S%H2543>donkey<s%> for <S%H7392>him;<s%> and he rode on it.

He <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> him <S%H3427>sitting<s%> under an <S%H424>oak.<s%> He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H376>him,<s%> "Are you the man of <S%H430>God<s%> who <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah?<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am."
Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>him,<s%> "Come <S%H1004>home<s%> with <S%H398>me,<s%> and eat <S%H3899>bread.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H7725>return<s%> with <S%H935>you,<s%> nor go in with <S%H398>you;<s%> neither will I eat <S%H3899>bread<s%> nor <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> with you in this <S%H4725>place.<s%>

For it was <S%H1697>said<s%> to me by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H398><s%> 'You shall eat no <S%H3899>bread<s%> nor <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H7725>there,<s%> nor turn again to <S%H3212>go<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> that you <S%H1980>came.<s%>'"

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5030>him,<s%> "I also am a prophet as you <S%H4397>are;<s%> and an angel <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to me by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7725><s%> 'Bring him back with you into your <S%H1004>house,<s%> that he may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>'" He lied to <S%H3584>him.<s%>
So he went <S%H7725>back<s%> with <S%H398>him,<s%> and ate <S%H3899>bread<s%> in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H8354>drank<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>
It <S%H3427>happened,<s%> as they sat at the <S%H7979>table,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> who brought him <S%H7725>back;<s%>

and he <S%H7121>cried<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> who <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H3282><s%> 'Because you have been <S%H4784>disobedient<s%> to the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> commanded <S%H6680>you,<s%>

but came <S%H7725>back,<s%> and have <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H8354>drunk<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of which he <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H398>you,<s%> "Eat no <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> no <S%H4325>water;<s%>" your <S%H5038>body<s%> shall not <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H6913>tomb<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>'"

It <S%H310>happened,<s%> after he had <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> he had <S%H8354>drunk,<s%> that he <S%H2280>saddled<s%> the <S%H2543>donkey<s%> for the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> whom he had brought <S%H7725>back.<s%>

When he had <S%H3212>gone,<s%> a <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H4672>met<s%> him by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H4191>killed<s%> <S%H5038>him.<s%> His body was <S%H7993>cast<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and the <S%H2543>donkey<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> <S%H738>it.<s%> The lion also <S%H5975>stood<s%> by the <S%H5038>body.<s%>

<S%H582>Behold,<s%> men passed <S%H5674>by,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5038>body<s%> <S%H7993>cast<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and the <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> the <S%H5038>body;<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H1696>told<s%> it in the <S%H5892>city<s%> where the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3427>lived.<s%>

When the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> who brought him <S%H7725>back<s%> from the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H559>it,<s%> he said, "It is the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> who was <S%H4784>disobedient<s%> to the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> Therefore <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him to the <S%H738>lion,<s%> which has <S%H7665>mauled<s%> him and <S%H4191>slain<s%> <S%H1697>him,<s%> according to the word of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which he spoke to <S%H1696>him.<s%>"
He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2280>"Saddle<s%> the <S%H2543>donkey<s%> for <S%H2280>me.<s%>" They saddled it.

He <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> his <S%H5038>body<s%> <S%H7993>cast<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and the <S%H2543>donkey<s%> and the <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> the <S%H5038>body.<s%> The <S%H738>lion<s%> had not <S%H398>eaten<s%> the <S%H5038>body,<s%> nor <S%H7665>mauled<s%> the <S%H2543>donkey.<s%>

The <S%H5030>prophet<s%> took <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H5038>body<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H3240>laid<s%> it on the <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> and brought it <S%H7725>back.<s%> He <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H5030>prophet<s%> to <S%H5594>mourn,<s%> and to bury <S%H6912>him.<s%>
He <S%H3240>laid<s%> his <S%H5038>body<s%> in his own <S%H6913>grave;<s%> and they <S%H5594>mourned<s%> over <S%H1945>him,<s%> saying, "Alas, my <S%H251>brother!<s%>"

It <S%H310>happened,<s%> after he had <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> that he spoke to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "When I am <S%H4191>dead,<s%> then <S%H6912>bury<s%> me in the <S%H6913>tomb<s%> in which the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H6912>buried.<s%> <S%H3240>Lay<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> his <S%H6106>bones.<s%>

For the <S%H1697>saying<s%> which he <S%H7121>cried<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> against the <S%H4196>altar<s%> in <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and against all the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places<s%> which are in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> will surely happen."

<S%H310>After<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H7725>didn't<s%> return from his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> but <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places<s%> from among <S%H7098>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%> Whoever <S%H2655>wanted<s%> <S%H4390>to,<s%> he consecrated <S%H3548>him,<s%> that there might be priests of the high <S%H1116>places.<s%>

This <S%H1697>thing<s%> became <S%H2403>sin<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam,<s%> even to cut it <S%H3582>off,<s%> and to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> it from off the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>
